Episode 582 features RIP SLYME, a group bursting with playfulness, humor and style, formed in 1994 and debuted on a major label in 2001.
They will perform â€œNettaiya,â€ a captivating, sophisticated number centered on a theme of a mid-summer love affair.
Enjoy this one-shot performance by RIP SLYME, temporarily reunited in celebration of their 25th anniversary year, as they gather around a DJ table, exuding mature allure.

ANISAMA FRIENDS is a unique unit brought together for this occasionâ€”angela, Oishi Masayoshi, Masami Okui, TrySail, and FLOWâ€”artists who have defined two decades of ANISAMA history.

Enjoy the one-shot performance of an anime anthem, cherished across the world by all generations and delivered by five top-tier acts with a powerful, energetic presence, exclusively for THE FIRST TAKE.
